page.title: 07FORESTRY - DERWENT VALLEY
page.content: The second section, known as 'Palette wood' because it is used to make palettes for storage purposes in warehouses, goes to a Willington, in Durham, firm. The top section of the tree is pulped down and pressed into chipboard to make bathroom, kitchen and bedroom furniture. Today many European and Scandinavian forests suffer from acid rain pollution. This was not Chopwell's problem. Its pollution came from Consett's Iron Works which are now closed so this is no longer a problem. We enjoyed our visit to the woods. We were shown how to use all five of our senses to the best advantage. We hope these woodlands continue to support the wildlife of the area as well as being beneficial to mankind for many years to come.
